long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
INSTANT TARGET ACCOUNT INTELLIGENCE
Clardo.io provides the single view of all openly available data on your Target Account and Prospect. Giving you the ideal hook at the perfect time.

360° view of your Target Account and Prospect
Clardo.io instantly aggregates relevant openly available data to provide you with a holistic picture of your Target Account and Prospect. Sales research and missing compelling events are a thing of the past. AI-powered account summaries and compelling event triggers ensure that you have the ideal hook at the perfect time.

Sell more, research less
With Clardo.io, you'll spend less time researching and more time selling. Our platform provides real-time insights and a comprehensive overview of your target accounts and prospects, so you can focus on closing more deals and meeting your targets.

Never miss a compelling event
Goodbye: generic outreach.  Hello: personalized connections. Clardo.io tracks real-time events and changes at your target accounts, giving you the ideal hook at the perfect time to reach out and close the deal.

Get personal with your prospects
Get “in the head” of your prospect. Clardo.io presents you a 360° view of your target accounts and prospects. Know what is going on at their company, in their social circles and in their personal lives. All in one simple action packed overview. 

Actionable AI-powered advice
Do you find the developments of AI exciting, but just not actionable enough for sales? Clardo.io uses AI to summarise the most important Target Account information for you. More than that Clardo.io gives you Next-Step-Advice for each of your Target Accounts.
